fields.title: Alumni Mentorship Program
fields.description:
Inculcating AMP to the main IITG portal, so that there is easy access to this program for students
and alumni mentors and they can access the portal as and when needed. Also, automating the total
Mentorship allotment system, with automatic email sending.

fields.title: AlumX Series
fields.description: Conduct a three-day lecture series by our most coveted alumni.

fields.title: Query Portal
fields.description: Opening up of a query portal for students for taking advice from alumni.

fields.title: Student Alumni Corporate Experience
fields.description:
A page on SAIL website, where alumni can post their ‘A Day in XYZ Company’ videos and blogs. Plus,
this will also hold various job and internship openings which can be posted by alumni.

fields.title: Faculty-Alumni Research Network (FARN):
fields.description:
The alumni can bring up the R&D projects of their respective firms to be solved by the IITG faculty and
Students.

fields.title: 25 th Anniversary IIT G Celebration
fields.description:
On the occasion of 25 th anniversary of IIT Guwahati, we plan to invite all the Alumni of IITG to
campus, and hold an event-cum-get together.
